title: How does Instatica Boost work?
body: We are an Instagram Growth Agency that helps businesses, influencers, and regular people get more Instagram followers and better engagement.

title: For These Reasons, You Should Never Purchase Instagram Likes
body: When Instagram altered its algorithm, a number of corporations and influencers expressed their dissatisfaction. They make money off of Instagram, but the platform has made it more difficult for them to obtain likes and followers, thus their earnings have decreased.

title: The Secret to Creating Amazing Content for Instagram
body: Making content on Instagram that is of good quality and can engage users has become more critical than it has ever been. This is primarily attributable to the fact that there is greater competition on the platform, and our users are quite outspoken about what they like and don't like about various aspects of our content.

title: Here's Why You Should Stay Away from Them!
body: A piece of software known as an Instagram bot automatically likes and comments on posts, follows and unfollows other accounts, and follows new accounts on your behalf. They can target specific hashtags or the followers of your competitors. Sounds like a pretty sweet deal if you ask me: less time spent on menial tasks, more followers, and improved engagement, right? When you look at them more closely, you'll see that they can actually do more harm than good to you!
